exercises.name: 練習B
exercises.overview: Use the table at the top of page 9 to answer questions 1-16, the table at the top of page 10 to answer questions 17-20, and the table in the middle of page 10 to answer questions 21-28. Answer in the format as shown in the examples, and end with a Japanese period (。).

exercises.name: 問題
exercises.overview: Listen to the audio and write what you hear for questions 1-10. Fill in the blanks for questions 11-19. Question 20 is unscored and an opportunity to write your name in katakana. Be sure to use proper kanji, katakana, and punctuation.

exercises.name: Exercise C
exercises.overview: Reading comprehension. Read the short passages and answer questions about the content.

exercises.name: Practice Problems 1
exercises.overview: Additional practice with hiragana reading and vocabulary recognition. Fill in the blanks with the correct hiragana.

exercises.name: Practice Problems 2
exercises.overview: Writing practice. Write the correct Japanese characters for the given English words.
